markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ceremony of Aeon's Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=2784) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your patron [aeon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=2) graced you with powers of protection. You can cast [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) and [_shield other_](/Spells.aspx?ID=281) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Ceremony of Aeon's Shield
